shorts.title: Penguins win Atlantic clash in Providence
shorts.title_distilled: Penguins win Atlantic clash in Providence.
shorts.description: The Wilkes-Barre/Scranton Penguins picked up a big conference win Saturday night on the road. One goal proved to be enough as Rutger McGroarty’s first-period shorthanded goal was the difference as the Penguins beat the Providence Bruins, 1-0, at the Amica Mutual Pavilion. Both the Penguins and Providence entered the clash at the top of the Atlantic Division standings. The victory vaults the Pens (13-4-1) back to the top of the conference, one point ahead of Providence (13-3). Lehigh Valley and Hershey are three and four in the division. WBS finished the road weekend with a 1-1 record. For McGroarty, it […]
shorts.content: The Wilkes-Barre/Scranton Penguins picked up a big conference win Saturday night on the road. One goal proved to be enough as Rutger McGroarty’s first-period shorthanded goal was the difference as the Penguins beat the Providence Bruins, 1-0, at the Amica Mutual Pavilion. Both the Penguins and Providence entered the clash at the top of the Atlantic Division standings. The victory vaults the Pens (13-4-1) back to the top of the conference, one point ahead of Providence (13-3). Lehigh Valley and Hershey are three and four in the division. WBS finished the road weekend with a 1-1 record. For McGroarty, it […]
shorts.content_distilled: Wilkes-Barre/Scranton Penguins picked up a big conference win Saturday night on the road.

shorts.title: School Notes, November 23, 2025
shorts.description: Abington Heights Senior Nathan Barrett had the opportunity to work full time for Scranton Electric Heating and Cooling Service Inc. as an HVAC apprentice. As a rising senior, school officials said he made the difficult decision to forgo the traditional senior experience in order to learn a trade. Working with school administration, Nathan arranged to complete his remaining credit requirements through online courses and secured approval from his employer so he could earn high school credit for his work experience. His employers report that he is learning the trade quickly and will become a valuable member of their organization through […]

shorts.title: Births, November 23, 2025
shorts.description: MOSES TAYLOR IBAÑEZ: A daughter, Nov. 14, to Xioana S. Ibañez Quinones, Scranton. SPINDLER: A son, Nov. 14, to Jesse Baumann and Brianna Spindler, Scranton.
